dao

Class AuthDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.AuthDAO

  • public class AuthDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs database operations for AuthToken objects.
    Author:
    John Werner

      The SQL Database Connection object.

      • deleteAllAuthTokens

      • getAuthToken

        public AuthToken getAuthToken(java.lang.String authID)
        Retrieves the information for an AuthToken in the database.
        Parameters:
        authID - the identifier for the AuthToken to be returned
        Returns:
        an AuthToken object representing the information in the database.

      • getAllAuthTokens

        public AuthToken[] getAllAuthTokens()
        Retrieves all information for all AuthTokens in the database.
        Returns:
        an array of AuthToken objects representing all the information in the AuthToken table of the database.
